'Children at risk' on Kik app, senior police officer warns as child abuse reports from messaging service quadruple  The Telegraph

The popular messaging app Kik is a haven for paedophiles, a senior police chief has warned as the number of UK child abuse reports relating to the service has quadrupled in the last two and a half years. India has asked its telecom operators to find ways of blocking applications such as Facebook and messaging app WhatsApp in the case of misuse, according to a document seen by Reuters.
